description: Script to produce a residual time series cleaned by ANATICOR model

ts.title: TimeSeriesVol
ts.description: Time series volume which should have already undergone preprocessing steps such as despiking, RetroIcor, RVT correction, time shifting, and volume registration.

polort.title: polort
polort.description: Polynomial for linear trend removal. Use the same order as for afni_proc.py

motion.title: motion
motion.description: Head motion parameters from 3dvolreg, also created by afni_proc.py

aseg.title: aseg
aseg.description: Aseg file from FreeSurfer's segmentation. This aseg volume must be in register with the EPI time series.

prefix.title: output
prefix.description: Use output (residual time series) for a prefix

radius.title: radius
radius.description: The radius of a local sphere mask in mm. Default is 15 mm for high resolution 1.7x1.7x3mm data.

view.title: view
view.description: Set the view of the output data. Default is +orig. Choose from +orig, +acpc, or +tlrc.

nuisance.title: nuisance
nuisance.description: Other nuisance regressors. Each regressor is a column in .1D file

Rsq_WMe.title: Rsq_WMe
Rsq_WMe.description: Produce an explained variance map for WMeLOCAL regressor.

coverage.title: coverage
coverage.description: Produce a spatial coverage map of WMeLOCAL regressor

echo.title: echo
echo.description: Echo each script command for debugging
